description: From Ancient Greek ζῆλος (zêlos, “zeal, jealousy”), from ζηλόω (zēlóō, “to emulate, to be jealous”). Doublet of jealous.

adjectives.description: zealous (comparative more zealous, superlative most zealous)

entries.meaning: Full of zeal; ardent, fervent; exhibiting enthusiasm or strong passion.
